title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When I use code assist, the file is being marked as dirty even though no changes have been made. Additionally, code assist is not appearing.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty without any changes. Code assist should still appear even if there are no suggestions.
SR:
1. Open the file.
2. Trigger code assist.
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirty without any changes being made.
4. Verify that code assist does not appear even when there are no suggestions.
